snippet: France’s Ministry of Defense said troops killed Abdelkarim al-Targui, of Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb, suspected to have ordered the killings of two French journalists in 2013 in Mali.
abstract: France's Defense Ministry confirms that French troops have killed Al Qaeda commander known as Abdelkarim al-Targui in northern Mali; Targui is believed to have ordered 2013 deaths of two French journalists.
lead_paragraph: France’s Ministry of Defense said troops killed Abdelkarim al-Targui, of Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb, suspected to have ordered the killings of two French journalists in 2013 in Mali.

headline.main: France Says Troops Killed Qaeda Commander in Mali
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Africa; Mali: French Troops Kill a Top Militant

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
